name: com.yans.views
description: A Unity package for managing UI views and their interactions. This package provides a flexible system for creating, showing, and hiding different UI views within a Unity project. It includes a base `View` class, an `EnumerableView<V>` for managing collections of views with object pooling, list adapters (`ListAdapter<V>`, `UniversalAdapter<V>`) for data binding, and a `ButtonView` component.
